1026220.name: Knights Province
1026220.description: Knights Province is intended to be an old-school RTS game. Unlike many modern RTS games, which are fast-paced and often are more about tactics, KP planned to emphasize on “strategy” component. Slower-paced gameplay, base-building, resources collection and processing, in-depth strategic choices, variety of resources and units, attention to details.
1026220.supported_languages: 英语, 俄语, 法语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 波兰语, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 土耳其语, 希腊语
